 Citizen Khan follows the trials and tribulations of big-hearted, loud-mouthed, tight-fisted, self-appointed community leader Mr Khan (Adil Ray) and his long suffering family â€“ wife Mrs Khan (Shobu Kapoor) and daughters Shazia (Maya Sondhi) and Alia (Bhavna Limbachia). 

 Mr Khan is a loveable larger than life character, with strong opinions and big dreams. The challenges he faces are those of many fathers â€“ how to make ends meet, keep his wife and daughters happy and impress his daughterâ€™s future in-laws. Things would be so much easier if everyone just listened to him and followed his lead, but his obsessively house-proud wife and two feisty daughters usually have other ideas.

 Citizen Khan was created by Adil Ray. The character Mr Khan has already featured in BBC Two comedy series Bellamyâ€™s People and on Radio Fourâ€™s Down the Line. In addition Mr Khan also hosted his own web series for the BBC Comedy website, in which he covered a variety of topics including the General Election, cricket and even delivered his own Christmas message to the nation.
